Description: ChatGPT Plugins to access real-world data with APIs. Read ChatGPT Plugins's reviews on Futurepedia.
Full_Description: ChatGPT Plugins FeaturesChatGPT Plugins are tools designed specifically for language models with safety as a core principle, and help ChatGPT access up-to-date information, run computations, or use third-party services.Plugin developers who have been invited off the waitlist can use the documentation to build a plugin for ChatGPT, which then lists the enabled plugins in the prompt shown to the language model as well as documentation to instruct the model how to use each.Access to Real-World and Recent DataPlugins can be âeyes and earsâ for language models, giving them access to information that is too recent, too personal, or too specific to be included in the training data. In response to a userâs explicit request, plugins can also enable language models to perform safe, constrained actions on their behalf, increasing the usefulness of the system overall. Plugins offer the potential to tackle various challenges associated with large language models, including âhallucinations,â keeping up with recent events, and accessing (with permission) proprietary information sources. By integrating explicit access to external dataâsuch as up-to-date informationÂ online, code-based calculations, or custom plugin-retrieved informationâlanguage models can strengthen their responses with evidence-based references.The first plugins have been created by Expedia, FiscalNote, Instacart, KAYAK, Klarna, Milo, OpenTable, Shopify, Slack, Speak, Wolfram, and Zapier.
